main event: A civilian reported a sighting of an unidentified flying object in Hartland, Maine on April 24, 1953.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 15 minutes,The object had a flashing light and moved vertically before disappearing straight up,Two 400c aircraft scrambled to investigate the sighting,The object made no sound and had no typical characteristics of conventional aircraft,The weather conditions were clear with unlimited visibility.
sighted object: one unidentified flying object with a flashing light
